name: Fleuch 2.0
description: Fleuch is a conservative version of Thrust, which was never ported to the Amiga. You fly your spaceship above a landscape rendered in primitive graphics, a landscape guarded by small gun emplacements. Your goal is to fly your spaceship through – and into – the terrain, in order to pick up a ball with your towing line, and fly it out of the underground mazes and up in the sky. The problem is that you have gravity to contend with, as well as the inertia of yourself and the ball; flying carelessly with the ball in tow will set you and the ball into a pendulum-like course and you may end up in a wall. You have a cannon to shoot the gun pods with.

shot.caption: Descending into a dungeon on level 3
Pick up the ball from the pillar and go
